item.title: Mar 6: CBS News 24/7, 1pm ET
item.description: President Trump delays tariffs on most goods from Mexico for one month; Firing squad executions still being allowed in some states.

item.title: Mar 6: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: President Trump expected to issue executive order to eliminate the Education Department; Boy kidnapped in Atlanta seven years ago found in Colorado.

item.title: 3/6: CBS Morning News
item.description: Trump offers one-month tariff exemption to U.S. automakers; Suspect in Kabul airport bombing is in U.S. custody.

item.title: Russia frees U.S. dual national Ksenia Karelina in prisoner swap
item.description: U.S. and Russian intelligence agencies negotiated an agreement to free American Ksenia Karelina in exchange for a Russian detainee.

item.title: Stocks drop a day after huge gains on tariff pause announcement
item.description: Trade tensions remain high despite President Trump's decision on Wednesday to temporarily freeze U.S. tariffs on dozens of countries.
